body:
This is a snapshot to compare the stock returns for Ferrari N.V. (NYSE:RACE) versus Tesla Motors Inc (NASDAQ:TSLA) .

Stock Prices as of Publication:RACE: $61.86TSLA: $252.51The stock return points we compare look at the last three-months, six-months and twelve-months. At the end of this snapshot dossier we also look at a side-by-side comparison of revenue through time.Both Ferrari N.V. and Tesla Motors Inc fall in thesector and the closest match we could find as a proxy is* Both Ferrari N.V. and Tesla Motors Inc havereturns over the last quarter but TSLA has outperformed RACE.* Both Ferrari N.V. and Tesla Motors Inc havereturns over the last half a year but RACE has outperformed TSLA.* Both Ferrari N.V. and Tesla Motors Inc havereturns over the last 12-months but RACE has outperformed TSLA.Ferrari N.V. (NYSE:RACE) has generated $3.39 billion in revenue in the last year while Tesla Motors Inc (NASDAQ:TSLA) has generated $5.93 billion in revenue in the last year.
title: Stock Returns: Ferrari N.V. (NYSE:RACE) versus Tesla Motors Inc (NASDAQ:TSLA)
